name: GKGameCenterViewController
desc: The dashboard that allows players to access their Game Center data in your game.

items.name: protocol GKGameCenterControllerDelegate
items.desc: The delegate that GameKit calls when the player dismisses the dashboard.

items.name: init(state: GKGameCenterViewControllerState)
items.desc: Returns a view controller that presents the specified Game Center content.

items.name: enum GKGameCenterViewControllerState
items.desc: The type of content for the view controller to present.

items.name: init(leaderboard: GKLeaderboard, playerScope: GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope)
items.desc: Returns a view controller that presents a leaderboard with data for the specified players.

items.name: init(leaderboardID: String, playerScope: GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope, timeScope: GKLeaderboard.TimeScope)
items.desc: Returns a view controller that presents a leaderboard with data from the specified players and time period.

items.name: init(achievementID: String)
items.desc: Returns a view controller that presents an achievement.
